replies.body:
The summoner is a lie!
*Ahem* apologies, sorry, don't know what came over me.

Isn't it already a pool party? Haven't played yet, but all the minions are already having a luau-thing right?

:P

Yup, the minions are out and about!

I have RP on my account and waiting.  What i'm saying is I'll literally pay you (and by literally i mean provide commerce to the company by which you are employed which in turn generates them revenue which they can then use to provide monetary compensation for the services you provide said company) to release them.
Are the pool party minions available on Howling Abyss or Crystal Scar?  If not, why not?
